title: Bump wrapper to Maven 3.8.4
body:
### Description

Now with relocations in place, we need to update the wrapper to a Maven version (minimum 3.8.3) that shows the relocation message properly. Otherwise users will only see the default warning:

Maven 3.8.1
==========
```
[WARNING] The artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb:jar:2.6.0.CR1 has been relocated to io.quarkiverse.amazonservices:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb:jar:1.0.0
```

Maven 3.8.4
==========

```
[WARNING] The artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb:jar:2.6.0.CR1 has been relocated to io.quarkiverse.amazonservices:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb:jar:1.0.0: io.quarkus:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb was relocated to io.quarkiverse.amazonservices:quarkus-amazon-dynamodb and is now managed by the io.quarkiverse.amazonservices:quarkus-amazon-services-bom:1.0.0. Please, update its groupId in the dependency declaration and import io.quarkiverse.amazonservices:quarkus-amazon-services-bom:1.0.0 in your project configuration. For more information about this change, please, refer to https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-2.6
```
See the related issue: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MNG-7253

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
